title: UNIQUE Open Floor Plan Home in Downtown MTV! Pet Friendly
posting_body: ['Madera', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'x265', 'Plan 1F  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 875 Sq.', 'Ft / From $4,454', "By rail, car or foot, Madera's right there.", 'Enjoy the finer things in life when you live in this stunning one bedroom apartment!', 'With large closets, espresso cabinets, and stainless steel appliances... you will love calling Madera your HOME!', 'Floor Plan Specials', '2 Weeks Free on Select Apartments', 'Property Amenities:', '* Availability24Hours', '* ClubHouse', '* ConferenceRoom', '* DoorAttendant', '* Elevator', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* GamingStations', '* Garage', '* Gate', '* GroupExercise', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* MultiUseRoom', '* NightPatrol', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '*', 'Other', '* PackageReceiving', '* Pool', '* Racquetball', '* RecRoom', '* Recycling', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* Spa', '* Sundeck', '* Transportation', '* TVLounge', '* WirelessInternet', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x265', 'Madera', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '455 W Evelyn Ave Mountain View, CA 94041', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'DISCLAIMER:', 'Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time.']
